website_summaries.verdict: A reliable compact top-load washer for those with limited space and budgets.
pros: Customers are often surprised by how quietly this small unit operates
With 1.6 cubic feet of interior space, you may have to do several loads to clean your weekly laundry, but the convenience and small design of this model make up for it
This washer includes equipment to hook the unit up directly to your faucet and drain, and it can be plugged into a standard outlet
cons: Some customers received used machines, and others experienced difficulty connecting hoses to their sink

website_summaries.verdict: Whether you have limited space or simply need a small washing machine, this portable model is a petite version of a high-efficiency washer.
pros: Durable, sturdy build resists scratches and dents
cons: Some reports of leaks and other minor defects typical of portable washing machines

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am truly amazed by this washer. It is extremely quiet and does a wonderful job. It arrived in perfect condition, no dents, scratches or broken parts. One draw back is that the swirling/bouncing motion causes sleeves and pant legs to twist and kind of knot together. In order to avoid excess wrinkling, I had to hit “pause” before the final spin and separate the twists and knots. It is quiet, does not splash or leak. The instructions are poorly translated and a bit difficult to follow. Also, it has no casters and weighs 70 lbs, so you DEFINITELY need a dolly to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Received a used one. It’s coming with water in it and smells musty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it- DO IT !
customer_reviews.text: I live in a pretty small Brooklyn apartment but my husband and I were tired of lugging clothes up and down the stairs (we live on the 4th floor) so we’d been contemplating a washing machine. We finally settled on this one and BOYYYYY, I’m super glad we did! It’s rather compact, it stores easily and is easy to use. If you’re thinking about it, GET IT. seriously. I rarely write reviews but I had to for this ! One of my fave purchases off of amazon & ima amazon QWEEEEN. Lol enjoy! Find me on IG: @BodyBySunny
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice little washer.
customer_reviews.text: After hurricane Michael my wife and I purchased an RV to live in while we wait for the insurance process. Our house is not safely accesible. With limited laundrymat options available we decided to purchase this little washer. We keep it in the hallway of our RV and purchased long hoses to run to the sink when in operation. It is reasonbly quiet and does a good job washing clothes. If the spin cycle were a little bit better at getting the water out this would easily be a 5 star machine. Very nice being able to wash clothes at home.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morris

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Operation Manual appears to have been translated into English and it's terrible. I have read and read the instructions, trying to understand what I am supposed to do, but I am often left with having to guess what the writer is trying to tell me. If I had known the manual would be like this, I would not have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vggcm

customer_reviews.title: Update: Noisy washer, shakes and jumps
customer_reviews.text: We bought it, as we live in apartment and going to have newborn twins. The weight is not light, so It’s not portable washer. A good thing is It has drain pump, you can place near the sink or bath tube. my next problem is ironing (or dryer). The clothes come out like chewed up. And it’s very noisy too. After 1,5months using it, I would give 1star. The problem is it shakes and jumps, so I need to stay and hold it. Disappointed, never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bakbergen T.

customer_reviews.title: new or used
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase, the outer box is dry. The washing machine is wet and with water. The control panel has a lot of practical scratches. still has water inside .Is this new or used?
customer_reviews.author: jiaoning shang

customer_reviews.title: Horrible productttttt
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY horrible!!!!!!! DONOT BUY THIS LOAD OF GARBAGEEEE. Horrible tech support broke in less than 4 months..... washing newborn clothes... are youkiddi ng meeeee????? (STOPPED SPINNING) BUT AMAZON PROVIDED THE PROPER SERVICE EVEN AFTER EXP. DATE THSNK YOUUUUU
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Panda PAN56MGP3 Portable Compact Washing Machine, Cloth Washer, 1.6 cu.ft
customer_reviews.text: I received it with no defects. I like having several water-level options for different load sizes. It gets things very clean and then it does two rinses afterward; it does shake out the water in the clothes pretty well. They dry faster. I had very little trouble putting the hoses in my kitchen sink, one drains the water and the other fills the tub. They were a perfect fit. I also added a Stalwart 82-43752 Mobile Roller with 4 Locking Wheels- Heavy-Duty Furniture and Appliance. It fits perfect f
customer_reviews.author: M. Deforrest

customer_reviews.title: Really great Washing Machine
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a couple times in different country i was happy that i found the same washing machine on amazon, i know this brand is a durable product because i used it often when i was in the other country. Im glad i found this brand, for its price its very reasonable Pros: Washes very clean. Pretty quite. Washes and dry spin. Very easy manual. Cons: Hose does not fit all sink. Have to get universal and longer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: If your buying for RV and expecting it to hook to your connection don’t buy it!!! It will hook to your sink only!! Very misleading. Going to try to return!
customer_reviews.author: gwen miller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not designed to work with standard American faucets or sinks. The faucet adaptor will randomly shoot off throwing attachments and water everywhere. Not sure what the outlet pipe was designed to go to but it can not be angled or attached correctly so that it does not shoot water everywhere without some modifications. This product must be used under direct supervision and within arms reach at all times to prevent flooding and damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis W Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Gets your stuff CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this washer. As long as you don’t over load it and follow the weight of the cloths it cleans your stuff so well! Not disappointed what so ever with this washer. It’s a bit taller then I originally thought but it is easy to move around. Really good little washer. And it’s quiet. I was expecting some lack of quality somewhere and maybe it would be that it’s all made out of plastic except the washer drum itself but it’s a solid washer. So much quieter then a standard cheap new washer.
customer_reviews.author: ray valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine has a very impressive control board. It even shakes the tub a little to help with unbalanced loads if needed and has a variety of washing and rinse choices. It also shimmies it a bit during the cycles to break the clothes wad up a bit before the next cycle starts. Holds quite a lot and seems to wash well. It screams at you if the lid is open during the spin cycle for safety reasons. Very loud sound to tell you when a cycle is finished. I noticed it seems to remove all of the water out at rinse and spin dry and not leave in some like most washing machines do.
customer_reviews.author: GeekAbility

customer_reviews.title: My little Amethyst Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Major life changer during these pandemic times. Going to the laundry mat when you don’t have a car, and waiting to use 1 washer, 1 dryer in apartment units where there’s 12 units per building doesn’t work out so well when most are still not able to go back to work. Not to mention, 3 flights of stairs and mild fibromyalgia. For me, this was a no brainier - EZbutton! I love this little machine, its functionality, cleaning ability, efficient, with minimal hassle! Named it “Amethyst” just for shits & giggles! Make sure to register your warranty once it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: SoulGiah

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been an apartment dweller for some time now without the luxury of washer/dryer hookups. I finally decided to try out a portable washer and Im in love! Super easy hookup and it cleans the clothes very good! The spin cycle is very efficient. It only takes about an hour for them to hang dry after. I will say the hoses are quite short so if youre not planning on moving it back and forth to the sink you may wanna purchase longer ones. Other than that, no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Best washing machine!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I ever made! Save me so much money especially having to use quarters at my laundry unit at my apartment! It’s easy and well built. The machine comes all in one piece, so you don’t have to worry about putting anything together.
customer_reviews.author: Nhi ho

customer_reviews.title: What a GEM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had portable washers before. LOTS of hands on. Fill the tub, drain, move the clothes, spin, REPEAT, REPEAT, each load. This one is so simple, cleans the clothing well. I have no complaints. I can wash 4 pairs of jeans at a time. So simple, and convenient. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this little washing machine. Easy to use, hooks up in a snap. Washes a larger load than I expected and has numerous, handy settings. They could have made it a little easier to move and store. Handles are minimal. Moves OK when tilted but once it is flat, it is hard to move into a tight space (like my pantry closet) because it does not move from side to side. Do highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Best washing machine I've every used seriously
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is obviously huge but packed well. They test the machine before shipping so a little water was present had washer for little over a month now, small and large loads all came out clean.. very clean! very powerful machine very quiet even when spinning. the choice of water levels and times to wash is so convenient I just love this machine. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.  Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This washer is great!! It gets clothes very clean, the lint trap works extremely well, and the multiple settings are pretty cool too. The only things I don't like about it are that it rinses twice, which I think is a bit of a waste. Not sure how to turn that off, or if it can be turned off. the manual doesn't explain the differences between the wash settings. Some of them are similar, so it would be nice to know what the differences are. And the beeper at the end can't be disabled. Otherwise, it's awesome, would purchase again. Get a wheeled dolly to move it around with, it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panda = Employee of the month
customer_reviews.text: Panda has changed our life! I bought this version because it DID NOT need an adapter for the sink. Just pop on and go! We live in an apartment. I tried using the washer here once, it was disgusting. Now, we do laundry in peace. Total game changer. I only regret not getting one many years before.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great washer
customer_reviews.text: I love this washing machine. It cleans our clothes better than our old full size washer. The motor is strong, and agitates clothes very well. It did not hook into our kitchen faucet, but we were able to find a part for it to work with our heavy duty garden hose. We have it on our patio, and the drain hose can water our plants. Highly recommend for those who want their own washer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Law

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!  And it holds more than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an appliance cart to be able to move the machine to shore it. I love my washer! It fits perfectly in the corner of my guest bathroom when not in use, and I just wheel it over to the sink and connect it to use. It is quiet - which surprised me. I bought the washer because my laundry room is downstairs in my townhouse. Hauling laundry up and down the stairs just wasn't working anymore. This way, my laundry gets done first thing in the morning, then I go downstairs for the rest of the day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gengen

customer_reviews.title: Great lil machine!
customer_reviews.text: I like this lil unit for my room. I rent a single occupancy room in an old hotel where you have a sink in your room but have shared kitchen n bathrooms. This lil baby saves me time n money by not having to spend a day at the laundry mat each week. Gets my clothes nice n clean n by time I get up in the morning they are dry if I hang em up the night before. Perfect for a single person or a couple in a small apt or RV
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dornan

customer_reviews.title: relief and luxury
customer_reviews.text: Got mine a couple of days ago. Did two months of laundry in less than a day. I'll be saving tons of cash now that I own this. No more laundromat necessary. It's larger than it looks in photos,quieter than you'd think, and cleans better than any machine I've used at the laundromat. My only gripe is I can't get rid of the child lock,no matter how many times I try,but it's not a huge deal ,I just won't watch it wash. I feel a great deal of relief owning this great machine!
customer_reviews.author: catheryn williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this washer. I was honestly expecting it to be cheap and not work well, but I was pleasantly surprised! It actually works great, is really quiet, and my clothes smell better when I use this washer than when I use the brand new washer in my building. It’s easy to use and doesn’t take up tons of space. Would be nice if it had wheels to make it a little easier to move around, not sure if that’s possible with a washer though anyway. I definitely recommend this washer and it is 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price!  Thank You Seller ;-)
customer_reviews.text: This portable washer Is The Best! I spent Days comparing dozens of different washers before choosing this one. I am so Happy I chose the right one! Has so many features and works so Super Well, that I would Literally Not sell it back for twice the price! Great Machine, our clothes have never been washed so well as this machine does. Thank you Seller!! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Ducky Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Laundry isn't a "chore" anymore!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! No more lugging laundry up and down 3 flights of stairs or waiting for machines. I hooked it to my shower so I never unhook it, just change the output of water on my shower head. I have washer queen sized sheets in it. I love being able to do laundry anytime, it is not a "chore" anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gillaspie

customer_reviews.title: game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this washing machine. We bought it a year ago, after we spent 6 weeks in Japan and saw it in every airbnb we stayed at. Was so happy to find it on amazon. It changed our lives. Didn't step into a laundromat since. Perfect for a 2-3 people household. It does a great job with cleaning the clothes. Love the "soak" program for whites. We put it on a dolly after a while, but before that I could just lift it up and move it around it's so light.
customer_reviews.author: anna kasnyik

customer_reviews.title: Try and find out
customer_reviews.text: This is such a gamble.... You try to ask amazon representative a question about how much water each water level use and you can chat for an hour without getting a simply answer. It works, laundry come out not too wet, it takes about 24hr to get dry on the rack at 50% humidity 74 degree Fahrenheit. That's all acceptable, but to find out how much water it actually needs... good luck...
customer_reviews.author: Miro

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size machine for us family of 4. Before the purchase, we had to go to the laundromat and it was so troublesome. Since the arrival of this washing machine, I have been doing laundry at home and I am so happy about it! No more taking in and out our laundry from our apartment. The machine is quiet. I am not a very big strong person, but I can carry it into the bathroom and hook it up to the sink. I can easily choose the setting and the machine does exactly what I order it to do. I am very happy about this washing machine! Thank you, Panda!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet W.

customer_reviews.title: Great washer for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I've had this washer for little over two months. So far I love this apartment size washer. It has saved me many trips to the Laundromat. On average I was 2 loads a week in it which is all of my work and casual clothes plus towels and wash clothes. It has also washed my hammock, small blankets and sheets. The trick to keep the noise down so far is to not over load it. I will up date my review once I've used it for some more time if i run into issues. So fare it has been doing a great job..
customer_reviews.author: msladyjt

customer_reviews.title: great small washer!
customer_reviews.text: This little washer is a beast! Not only is it quiet, it does a great job. I have waited to write a review to see how well it held up. It has proven itself, I do about 6-7 loads a day mon-fri and it is still going strong. It fits around two sets of twin sheets comfortably. It has many settings and gets the fabric close to dry with the spin cycle.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Panda PAN56MGP3 is a Great Choice for a Reliable, No-Fuss Portable Washing Machine
customer_reviews.text: Panda PAN56MGP3 Portable Washer Machine operates efficiently at cleaning clothes using a variety of water levels and multiple washing settings. The most crucial step is connecting the quick-release nozzle to the faucet which provides a secure attachement for the water intake hose to the faucet. Once the washing maching is properly connected to the water source, easy programming requires you to simply input water level settings, washing operations, and wash cycle durations. The variety of settings enables you to customize each wash load cycle. Solidly built unit gets the job done in a no-fuss fashion. The Panda PAN56MGP3 is a great choice for a portable washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Washes clothes fast. Kinda small but hey it’s a portable Ans it’s quiet. Not to mention it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jackee

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine. Noisy but works well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing can get pretty loud. The water hoses are thin so the water rushing through sounds like a river. Also the clutch that stops the inside from spinning is a loud thud. Other than the noise, it's a great little machine. I can fit 4-5 bath towels or do a day's worth of laundry for my family of three. You can change the water levels to save water if you have smaller loads and there is a little lint catcher inside to help catch fuzz etc. It only uses cold water.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good washer but not great
customer_reviews.text: Great little portable washer, however, it could be even better if the drain hose was a bit thicker. Drain hose is very fragile and the water pump was broken off the washer body when I received it. Returned the 1st one and got a replacement in 2 days. Also, the drain pump is held to the frame of the washer by a small plastic piece. Please inspect the hose and the water pump. These 2 parts are the weakest part of the washer unit.
customer_reviews.author: John Cee

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine!
customer_reviews.text: It's big, but not too big. I love that it's fully automatic, but there are ways for me to manipulate aspects (water depth, length of cycle, etc). It's not too loud. We had the panda with the two sides before, and this is like the Ritz. Set it, forget it. You can even have it delay, so the clothes don't sour over a hot day while you're at work. Would absolutely buy again. DO GET THE TROLLEY that they say folks usually buy with it. It's a perfect fit on the smallest setting, and Panda is heavy enough to make lugging it by hand no fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a small and fully automatic one, and looked through the reviews of some models. Definitely this one is worth buying, worth spending a little bit more money and get quality product. Have been using this washing machine for nearly a month, 2 or 3 times a week; perfect working condition, will update my review after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vardan Stepanyan

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS LITTLE WASHER. I BOUGHT IT FOR MY RV BUT I USED IT IN THE HOUSE AS SOON AS I RECEIVED IT. DOES ALMOST EVERYTHING MY BIG LG WASHER DOES. WHEN I GET BACK FROM MY TRAVELS I WILL UPDATE WITH ANY ISSUES I ENCOUNTERED. BY THE WAY, SINCE IT IS 50LBS. I RECOMMEND THAT IS STAY IN ONE LOCATION. (UNLESS YOU HAVE A GREAT BACK AND ARE A WEIGHT LIFTER)
customer_reviews.author: cathie petro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!  LOVE IT! lOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really sure what I was expecting, other than just wash my clothes. Get them clean. But OMG, it cleans them, and then spins them so dry that they're nearly completely dry when you take them out. I just hang them up in another room or outside ( if it ever stops raining..LOL) in a few hours or overnight they are ready to wear. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: MARIE KEUL

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our small lake cottage with a small septic tank. I took days looking at all the options. Was delivered in fine order, easy to hook up BUT first time I used it-it failed. The dreaded E1 error code-meaning it wouldn't drain. Talked to Amazon customer service. They tried to find a fix but all the things they suggested did not work. They refunded my money but I have to go and buy a box big enough to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Serlib

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine for portable use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. I purchased it to use while my laundry room was being renovated so I could continue to wash laundry in my home, rather than going to a laundromat. Before purchasing I would spend $50 per laundromat trip; so this machine ultimately saved me money and inconveniences. It washes clothes very well, easy to use, and I appreciated the multiple cycle options. I did have to purchase some plumbing adapters to fit my sink, but that was a minimal expense. After I gained access to my regular washing machine, I gave this machine to my daughter to use in her apartment. She loves it too! In my opinion, you can go wrong with this portable machine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small and compact yet, has a large tub and is a top loader. It was very simple to install. The only 2 small problems are that it has no rollers and I need to lift it to be close to the sink and the hose that connects the machine to the faucet is very short. So far, I've had no luck finding a longer one but, I'm not losing hope. Otherwise, the price was great, the machine does what it's supposed to do and the delivery was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lili1947

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this washing machine for slightly over a month and here are my thoughts: 1. It does not really wash clothes very well. The washing machines in the laundry room in my building did MUCH BETTER job. Unfortunately, due to COVID I am not able to use my laundry room at the moment, but this washing machine does not clean really stained clothes. 2. It destroys your clothes. My towels, sheets and t-shirts come out with loose threads, pulls etc. I did not even try to wash anything delicate. 3. The hose got broken after 1 month of usage... Not sure if I can find a replacement....
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Got errors after first use
customer_reviews.text: Got errors after first use. Smaller then made to be.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could write a novel about how much I love this washing machine. But I won’t lol. Basically, if you’re thinking about getting this. Do it. I researched so much before buying, and I’m SOO glad I decided on this one! I’m just in love! It works great and exceeds my expectations. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Ell_007

customer_reviews.title: excellent washer
customer_reviews.text: Is very use to use it, it brings the connection to the kitchen sink, the pump works to expele the water, the only cons is somewhat heavy, I bought this item from amazon to move the washer: SPACECARE 4 Rubber Locking Swivel Wheels Telescopic Furniture Dolly Roller with Size Adjustable-STFD001
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Worker Bee
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the instructions kind of suck for figuring out what the difference is between wash cycles. Here's the rough times for each: Normal- 60 min Standard- 45 min Quick Wash- 25 min Heavy Duty- 52 min
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Machine
customer_reviews.text: Well, I would have added a photo or video but my webcam doesn't reach that far. Anyhow, Just got this machine on Saturday have done 7 full loads and they have been run on heavy duty and then put to the air dry setting. I have got to say that this machine is really worth the money. I love it. It handles the loads that I have put in there and does an amazing job. Would I recommend this Washer to others? I would with 100% satisfaction. My next purchase will be the Panda 3.78 Compact Clothes Dryer. and will be looking forward to that working as well as this washing machine is. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a must!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to use in our toy hauler camper we take really long trips and I always hate coming home and having to do laundry for 3 days, having this washer in the back of my camper is a godsend it works phenomenally I don't know what I've done all these years without this thing
customer_reviews.author: Jojo1971

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month now and it's probably the best thing I've bought for my condo. I'm a 1BR with no laundry hookups. There are shared machines in the building, so sometimes they're not always available. The instructions are worded a bit weirdly, but it was a breeze to set up. It's not too heavy for me, but it is awkward to move it around, so I bought the dolly that others suggested. Couldn't be easier. Doesn't take up too much space. Hooks up to my kitchen tap. Easy lemon squeezy.
customer_reviews.author: JNG

customer_reviews.title: The best portable washing machine ever
customer_reviews.text: We used to take our laundry down stairs where building’s commercial washing machines are. Since we got this Panda we regretted that we should have bought this before. No more $3 for washing and drying. Also, would like to draw your attention at how this machine washes, incredibly clean and it really brings your clothes original colour back.
customer_reviews.author: Kairat

customer_reviews.title: Panda portable washer
customer_reviews.text: Great washer for the first month. Then it developed a rattling sound, like something came lose. Contacted manufacturer and was informed Shoppers Goods Store was not an authorized Amazon dealer. Now I'm dealing with Shoppers Good Store and they are giving me a "run-a-round". DO NOT BUY FROM SHOPPERS GOOD STORE! They are NOT GOOD, RELIABLE, HONEST, NOT WORTH THEIR WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.author: OpalRose1950

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I have waited for a few months to type this out. I have put this thing through hell. 14 straight hours of washing. air drying. This thing is a BEAST. Works great. Washes great, the air dry is works well. Not dry, but hang the clothes up, three hours later, dry. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: daniel balchen

customer_reviews.title: A real powerhouse for a compact washer.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this machine. It's powerful, efficient, and cute. The instruction manual could use some improving as my is written in broken English, but after 2 trial loads, I've mastered the routine. I've owned this for 2 weeks and love it. 'Hope I get many years use from it. I plan to get the Panda dryer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Cota

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is really awesome. It handles well and leaves our clothes very clean and smelling fresh. The company deserves 5 stars from me. Somehow the machine became damaged after washing a bed sheet and even after troubleshooting it with the directions provided by customer service I couldn’t get it to work again. The company replaced my machine and I received it within two weeks of my initial communication with them despite the pandemic. My machine works very well and I’m very happy with this product. I’ve recommended it to my relatives and I would recommend it to anyone looking for quality, reliability and a space saving product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Apartment” master must “
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment where the community Laundry is not as respect full as it should be and I always want it to have Ana independent small and smart arrangement like a small washing machine, and that helped me out of the Situation . Done ✅ now I am relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah z.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washer
customer_reviews.text: This washer works great as long as you load the clothing loosely (6-7 items), mix clothing of different weights (don't put too many heavy cloths in at once, all jeans/ all towels), and only use about 1/3 a cup on laudry detergent. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Portable Washer
customer_reviews.text: This Portable washer works pretty good once you figure out how many clothes to put in and how much water to add. Now once you figure out the 1-4 settings you are good to go. Functions 5-9 more like manual functions and 10 is just air dry. Pretty Awesome machine, Quiet, but it will let you know if you make a mistake. Other than that it's pretty simple to setup.
customer_reviews.author: richard johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good for small spaces. Like a regular machine
customer_reviews.text: Can't move around easy but its not that heavy. The machine works great for me clothes and I connect it to my kitchen sink in my apartment to wash clothes. Not bad on the energy and easy to use. It even has child safety.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S

customer_reviews.title: Great washer
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best purchase I ever made. I use this in my condo. First I bought for my baby’s clothes but capacity is large I am washing our clothes too. I also bought a furniture carrier to slide this in to the bathroom and out easily. It’s pretty light. My previous apartment had washer, it wasn’t cleaning like this one does. It has 26 min quick wash. You have to set the temperature of the water yourself I think it’s better I raise the temp for better cleaning. I can definitely recommend it. I relied on the reviews and then order this, I am %100 satisfied. I am writing this product to help others as well
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. It is very quiet, has a powerful spin while washing and or draining, it is well build and has a lot of future for the amazing low price. Highly recommended for anyone who does not have a full size laundry hook up in their home/apartment. Amazingly you can also load lots of laundry and the setup was fairly easy. We do recommend a washer dolly for this unit as it has no wheels on it. Happy washing all!!
customer_reviews.author: Satomi Nakagawa

customer_reviews.title: Love this washer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this compact washer!!! I got it for my salon, and it works great! Super easy to hook up also!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable washing machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my washing machine. So far, it does not fail me. Our clothes comes clean. Its very useful that I dont need to go to laundromat. Its fully automatic that I just need to hang clothes overnight to dry. During summer, clothes dries fast of course, around 2-3hours. Just need to have a dolly so you can move it easily anytime and anywhere you want. Plus I love that it has the lint catcher, it does not collect all lints in clothes but it does get a lot, so it helps. I always recommends this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Valencia-Fausto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. Has a quick connect set up for the sink that makes it super easy to set up. Not super loud. Washed my queen quilt easily. Wouldn't push it past that load wise but so far this little thing washes and runs like a champ. As long as this thing lasts while living in the apartment I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: The Kimberly's

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Once you figure out how to properly use it, and it wont take long, it's way worth it in every way. I wouldnt doubt its would wash my down quilt but itself. My one and only advice for anyone that is going to buy a portable washer, is spend the extra 50-100 dollars and have the simplicity of fully automated washing. I bought a two stage before this and it was like washing clothes in the tub in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Iam

customer_reviews.title: Drying type sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this machine had a secondary water port. Only real down side is when you hang dry your clothes they arent soft like out of the dryer they are crunchy like you hand washed them. I would say silks and light linings its 100% perfect on cotton it's a 60% overall rating
customer_reviews.author: Coyotegurl

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great Machine. Bought one for my Daughter, and she loves her Panda Portable Machine. After seeing how easy it was for her to set-up the Panda Portable Machine, wash four loads of clothes ( no problems + no leaks ) I was very impressed. I ended up buying one for myself. Overall ~ Top Notch Panda Portable Wash Machines.. (Panda PAN56MGP3 Portable Compact Washing Machine, Cloth Washer, 1.6 cu.ft)
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but came a little flawed
customer_reviews.text: Well aside from the fact that it came with water under the drum as if it was one that had been returned or maybe tested and there was a crack on the top of tub itself, it appears to work well. It vibrates too much to be used on the 2nd floor of an old apartment building but its convenient and should be good for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: What i like most about this washing machine is that its light weight, i bought a trolley and I can easily move it around as I dont have a separate laundry room, the water inlet hose came with all the correct fittings and it was easy to get it working by attaching it to my kitchen tap and outlet hose can also go in mu kitchen Sink drain, which makes it very convenient and I dont have to go to laundromat any more.. My clothes come out cleaner than the laundromat machine. its not too noisy either.. I have been using it for last 3 months now..
customer_reviews.author: Ks

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little washer.
customer_reviews.text: Its not a bad little washer. The only downfall is the lack of accessories. The water line in is way short and the only replacements I've seen on Amazon are cheap Chinese crap that will pop when you try to use them. Other than that it works good. I would recommend the getting a little dolly for it, makes using it way easier.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little washer
customer_reviews.text: I have it for a year now and it is still amazing. It washes very clean.
customer_reviews.author: ny and nige

customer_reviews.title: Dark and black cloths dirt stains unknown reasons.
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to full size machines then this will be a bit weird at first. But I bought is as my nyc apartment doesn't have any space. Installed and worked well so far. The only issue I see is my black and dark cloths get stains of dirt on them I don't know if it's something the pockets of the cloths or something else. I clean the filters after every wash. I don't know the issues. I wash like 10 light cloths max and leave good amount of space for good rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed N.

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: Temporarily housed in a camper while building and needed a small washer. Read the reviews and liked what I saw but always a little skepticism prevails. I do about four loads a week and have been using it about two months now. I cannot say enough positive comments. It does a great job cleaning, actually better than my full size whirlpool! Spins almost all of the water out of clothing. No regrets only accolades!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Omggg I just got the machine today. I was excited because it actually came in sooner than scheduled ship date. I tried to use the machine but the manual is badly translated. It's not user friendly at all. Plus the water between the faucet and the adapter leaks terribly once I power off the machine the water from the faucet and the adapter splashed every where 😠 I'm very disappointed now my clothes is soaking wet inside the machine. See the video before you buy this machine people.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great little washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little washing machine. Easy to connect. Just push a couple of buttons and works like a full size automatic washer. Comes with a short inlet house, so had to buy a longer hose at Home Depot to use the washer in the bathroom without needing to move it closer to the faucet. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nukleric

customer_reviews.title: Smashes itself to pieces during transit.
customer_reviews.text: First one had a broken water level sensor. I looked inside and saw that the free floating bin inside had done flip flops inside the washer and smashed the insides of the washer in multiple places. They don't secure the free floating bin for transit. Got a replacement but it had also done the croppy flop and there's some damage to the rims and possibly more but it worked so whatever. Manual is badly translated but you don't need much to use the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: leaks tons of water from where the hose attaches on the machine
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Wow what an amazing wash machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact machine. I live with a nosey landlord who constantly complains that a half filled machine is over filled. Therefore I got this machine to put inside the stand up shower. It’s quiet and extremely practical. Would highly likely to new buyers to get it without hesitation!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Picinic

customer_reviews.title: This machine is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing from Amazon for a while and I have gotten some really nice things from Amazon and have never been to diligent about leaving reviews. Not sure why, because they always help me. Nonetheless, this purchase has compelled me to leave a review. The hook up was easy it worked like a charm and I am amazed. It holds quite a bit and works quietly. It is actually more quiet than my dishwasher. Works like a charm! Excellent puchase!
customer_reviews.author: Donita Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer! I live on a third floor and I don’t get any noise complaints from it. You hear slight noise when it spins otherwise you just hear some slight vibration. Assembly was easy. Also, it is super convenient for small places. It hooked up to the sink and plugged in, once it’s programmed the machine does the rest of the work!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this washer. Everything about it was easy to use. Only reason for return was because the size was too small which I was disappointed about because i really wanted to keep it but didn’t fit my family’s needs for just that, hence it being a “compact” washer. Have no dislikes about this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Apartments
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine. Great for apartments. I suggest buying an anti vibration mat if you live in an upstairs apartment. Washes really well and is 100x better than those manual portable washers. My only problem is that I can’t add more soap or fabric conditioner without the machine stopping and making an obnoxious alarm sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Washer works well. Just like regular washers. Not too heavy. First 3 loads had a weird smell to it but it did go away. Reason only gave it 4 stars is because the button instructions are not included. Had to figure out button combinations.
customer_reviews.author: CinNaRV

customer_reviews.title: Small but fast and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We run it about 5 times per day and have had it for 2 months. Cleans our office scrubs. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Great for small apartments!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm giving this 5 stars! It's perfect for my small apartment with no hookups. The attachments worked perfectly with my sink. It takes a little longer, but it beats the hell out of going to the laundromat. I definitely recommend getting the rolling cart to put underneath the washer to make maneuverability easier. AND DON'T FORGET TO PUT THE DRAINAGE TUBE IN THE SINK *BEFORE* YOU USE THIS!!! (Or you'll learn the hard way and never forget again! haha)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and to move
customer_reviews.text: It a great washer and dose a great job cleaning clothes. It a trip that the washer dose a 3 step wash process. But the timer is a little off. It may say 47 minutes when it's more like a hour. But over all I made a great decision buying this washer and like so much I got a friend one to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for value quality space saving quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. Clothes are clean. Very little vibration when spinning. Easy to set up and use. Basically just like a full size washer but in half size and manually controlling water. I am disabled and in a small space so moving it is a headache. So easy fix getting some wheels, furniture mover. That was my only issue not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hook

customer_reviews.title: Confusing wash cycle but good machine
customer_reviews.text: If you've used machines that allow you to simply select wash cycles (like whites or delicates) this may be frustrating. With this machine you will first select water level (you'll reference pics of detergent cups to do that) then select cycle by number. It was confusing and I'm not sure if I did it right.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dubs

customer_reviews.title: its great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little washer I honestly was looking around for a washer this was so easy to put together and use. The smaller loads I did were so quite when I had bulkier items you did hear it when it was spinning but nothing that would make me not want to keep it. To move it, I do suggest getting something to wheel it around that what I did and its so easy. Without it it would be a hassle to move but I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Evalynn

customer_reviews.title: Better than a boyfriend! I'm in love with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, must have purchase!!! Easy to use, easy to set up, washes clothes very well. It doesn't have wheels but I purchased these furniture sliders and it moves across my hardwoods like a dream. (and the sliders stay on) Super Sliders 4313295N Secure...
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Relaxatio
customer_reviews.text: Freedom freedom from other people. O yeah the machine works really well or I wouldn't be free free from other people.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Is was not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to return back bc u have to put the thing in the floor for trow the water not in the sing like they said bc is not to strong for that plus is not easy for use nether,is lock Evey single time the only thing is wash very good after that if u undanstand buy
customer_reviews.author: ROSA Hernández

customer_reviews.title: over rated
customer_reviews.text: the use instructions are impossible. IN PLAIN ENGLISH PLEASE. figured it out enough to get by. water level doesn't fill to the 5 level. it started leaking upper inside somewhere after about a month. weird, 7-8 rapid drops at a time. looked for the leak, didn't find it. I will deal with it. for now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Tiny machine with the power of a much larger one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. We put it in our 32 foot camper. I’m a small women and I can move it easily if needed. It handled much larger loads then I could have imagined. I did 4 jeans and 3 shirts and a sweater and it handled it like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: C SO

customer_reviews.title: Does the job may have to get different hose
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine I do have to order a different hose because hook up is hard and it doesn't hold a lot I have done 9 loads already and haven't had an issue yet I will let y'all know if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Abney

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a washer-less apartment and this has been doing a great job of getting my clothes clean. The size is great for a portable washer too, i wash a few outfits at a time. two loads is all my laundry for the week pretty much.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Da best
customer_reviews.text: Holy snap! Best thing I ever bought easy to use cleans my clothes wondering saved load of quarters to the laundromat not hard to use also it'll come to you as if it was used but that's only cause they test it and make sure it works before the mail it to you. Ive had it for 2 months already and it still works no complaints on this machine I highly do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

product_meta.title: Panda 1.34 cu. Ft. Portable Washer Machine, PAN56MGP3
product_meta.description: Boasting a unique, space-saving design, the new model of Panda Compact 1. 34 cu. ft. Portable Load Washer makes your laundry easy and simple. It is compact which is perfect for small loads for daily usage, you can use it in apartment, dorms, RVs, and it just the right size to be the second washer in your house. This portable top load upper drainage washing machine offers 10 different washing programs set with the touch of a button. 5 water level settings to make sure your clothes come out as clean as can be. Its sturdy and quiet design accommodates up to 10 lbs. of laundry in its stainless-steel drum which is durable and resists rust and chipping. Lightweight to carry around, regular 3 prongs 110 Voltage can be plugged anywhere. 310 Watts of motor rate, it saves the electricity bills. Brand: Panda Model: PAN56MGP3 Color of body: Light Gray Color of lid: Purple Volume Capacity: 1. 34 Cu. ft Wash Program: 10 Water Level: 5 Tub Material: Stainless Steel Dimensions: 20 * 19 * 34 inch Weight: 51 lbs 1 Year manufacturer Please acknowledge before purchasing: *This machine only has ONE water inlet that can be connected to a standard faucet using the inlet hose and quick adapter in the package. Please adjust water temperature by the faucet. **To ensure the quality of products, all of the machines were water tested by the manufacture before transporting to our warehouse, so you will have chance to see water mark or water left outside or inside the machine. ***When unpacking the machine, you might see a black rectangle plastic piece located at the bottom of the machine, it is the motor protection part used to protect the motor during shipment. It is not part of the machine, please remove it before using the machine.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Panda PAN56MGP3 Portable Washing Machine, one quick connect adapter kit, one inlet hose and one drain hose
Washer machine dimensions: 20” L x 19.5” W x 34” H. Volume capacity: 1.34 Cu. Ft. Max hold weight: 10 lbs. Length of inlet hose: 39”. Length of drain hose: 55”
This machine only has one water inlet that can connect to a standard faucet using the inlet hose and quick adapter in the package. Please adjust water temperature by the faucet
Regular 3 prongs 110 Voltage can be plugged anywhere. 310 Watts of motor rate, it saves the electricity bills
Electronic controls with LED display 10 washing programs and 5 water levels Stainless steel drum is durable and resists rust and chipping

specifications.Included Components: Inlet hose with faucet adaptor, Regular 3 prongs Power Cord
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars924 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
